author: davidlange6
body:
Not sure why.. but seems the forward port of the menu from 75x has put 76x into an inconsistent state. This commit partly reverts

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/969c956073a662431e1ffb9d3269f63eefed6a1f#diff-480ea634e7991c694ba8ed359ee91256

since we are asked to allow hlt menus not to be forked, it would be good to know why it seems they have forked. Maybe the cause is simply that this 75x PR has not yet been merged 

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/11547

but that should not be the issue.

There are other changes in the commit above that experts should have a look through and decide if needed or not.
title: revert back the 75x automerge for HLT config v4
